content.query:
USE gold_db
GO
CREATE OR ALTER PROC CreateSQLServerlessView_gold @ViewName nvarchar(100)
AS
BEGIN
    DECLARE @statement NVARCHAR(MAX);

    SET @statement = N'
    CREATE OR ALTER VIEW ' + QUOTENAME(@ViewName) + N' AS
    SELECT *
    FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://mottadeproj.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/Sales/' + @ViewName + '/'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) AS [result];';

    EXEC (@statement);
END
GO
